website_summaries.verdict: A unique cowl-neck tunic made of heavier material that pairs well with leggings.
pros: Flared bottom preserves the wearer's curves and is not as "tent-like" as some tunics
cons: Plus-sizes are not "plus" in American standards

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up for loose fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot seven and about 150 pounds. I wanted a loose fit so I went with the xl. The sleeve length is great and the shirt fits the chest and drapes really well. I love the collar button detail. It looks like a high quality garment. Very flattering and very comfortable. I'll probably be getting another color.
customer_reviews.author: Karla C.

customer_reviews.title: Its nice even on an older woman ( 59) I like ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my top. It shipped quickly! Very soft and thicker than I thought. I got the large. I am 5’7” and about 165 lbs. Its nice even on an older woman ( 59) I like it! May order the wine color🌝
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the length and the shape it has
customer_reviews.text: This top is very cute! I love the length and the shape it has. It is perfect over tights or leggings and would especially look cute with some nice boots! I would say the size chart is just a smidge off, nothing drastic though. I purchased a small and it could still be a little tighter. My waist is 26 inches and my bust 32 inches. Overall I am very satisfied though and happy that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This is too cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this shirt! The buttons and the design of the neck are very cute. It's very comfortable and will be great for winter. It fits exactly as I expected and looks wonderful. It has a slight flare at the bottom which adds to it. This is a very nice shirt. It goes wonderfully with leggings and some boots. It's soft and has not shrunk in the dryer either. I am 5'6" and I purchased a large. It fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice to pair with leggings
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice to pair with leggings. I'm 5'4" 140lbs and 18 months pregnant. This top hides imperfections and covers my bum. I got a size medium
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue one, but go by the black description because the blue one does not have a Kanga drawstring or pocket. I was looking for a tunic top to wear with leggings and this fit perfect. It fits and hangs nice, not to big and not to snug. I am 5'2 @ 112lbs and ordered a small. The length hides my bottom. The color blue was true to the picture. This can be worn as dressy or casual. I have not washed it yet so don't know how it will wash up. If it is not good I will come back and report. Might order the black one too!
customer_reviews.author: bargain shopper 52

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a tunic
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shirt to wear with leggings or jeggings. Material quality is good, soft and thick. The gradual flare makes it a more flattering cut and not so tent-like. I am 5'10'' so I got the XL for sleeve length. It fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric that doesn't hold up after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this shirt. The fabric pills just after one wash. After the second wash, the fabric is stretched out, uneven and rough. I am 5'3" 115 pounds and I bought a small. I have attached a photo of how terrible the shirt looks after two washes. This is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous S.H.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Its material is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Its material is very comfortable, its color is also suitable for me, let me look very energetic. I'm going to wear it to my holiday party, and I think I will be very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: pingping zhan

customer_reviews.title: Does not flare as shown.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two different sizes in order to have for the holidays. Neither one fit. I am 5ft 3in, 175lbs. I normally wear XLarge so ordered XLarge and a XXLarge. Neither fit. Will be returning them. When putting the tops together, the XXLarge is bigger in the shoulders, 1/2in longer, sleeves 1in longer but narrower in the midsection. It does not flare as the picture shows. So the larger top is designed for tall thin people not a plus size. Also the XLarge seems to have a little more stretch than the XXLarge
customer_reviews.author: B.  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Color is pretty & neckline is attractive
customer_reviews.text: I went two sizes larger than I normally wear so this top would be loose and long on me. Unfortunately, it must be designed for snug fit. It does not hang as pictured; instead, it is very snug. Color is pretty & neckline is attractive. Sleeves are a bit long.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the sizing chart!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a medium, but according to the sizing chart, I should have ordered a XXL. I opted to order the XL since most reviews said to order a size up. The XL was too big! The material is very nice and the shirt appears to be well made. I would like to order in a different size, but can't decide between medium or large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No. No no!!!!! Heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: No. No no!!!!! Heavy knitted material that clings tightly and has no bounce or life to it. Hangs and clings. Not a pleasant wear
customer_reviews.author: E. F. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much,  the next day I ordered another in a different color!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it in a large and it fits perfectly. For reference, I am 5'2 and 160 lbs. Very flattering and covers my bum. It looks fantastic with leggings and tall boots. I love it so much the next day I ordered it in the gray. Nice material, almost like tshirt material but thicker. I've already washed it in cold, threw in the dryer for a few minutes and hung to continue drying. Buy this, you will not regret it!😁. Update:. After 2 washes, the material thinned significantly and pilled..not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money / time
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, and doesn't flare like shown in the picture. Just looks like a large lose cloth hanging around you. Also the material is cheap and looked faded just as I received it.
customer_reviews.author: conphident4

customer_reviews.title: I'm only five foot so it fell too long on ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm only five foot so it fell too long on me, made me look heavier. Also the material was not what I expected, it's not as rich looking as it appears. More of a sweatshirt type material. Not dressy which was what I expected from the picture. Definitely for taller people.
customer_reviews.author: P. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality. Well made. Fit according to size and TONS of compliments!! What else would one need to know? I will buy from this brand again and again and you should too if you like people telling you how nice you look. Heavyweight material, great for winter wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm top, well made
customer_reviews.text: Was truly surprised at how nice the fabric is. I ordered in grey and was expecting something that looked like sweatshirt material that I could wear to run around on weekends. What arrived is quite well made and a lovely even dark grey color. Very well sewn and finished without a loose thread on it. Neckline is a touch higher than shown but that's only to the good, it'll be warmer around my neck. All in all I'm quite pleased with it and for the price it's a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Usher (Phil/Cynthia)

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, and my friend loved it so much she stole mine so I had to buy another :) I'm 5'6" and 140 lbs and bought the large as I have fairly broad shoulders. It fit perfectly. My friend and I are both size 8 if that helps. Nice soft material, thick enough to not cling to my mini-muffin top, but no so thick that it's too hot. Sort of in between t-shirt and sweatshirt weight, I guess. The color is a nice deep blood red (i.e. more warm than cool). She's blonde and fair skinned and I'm dark haired with a yellower skin tone and it looks great on both of us.
customer_reviews.author: MacDoodle

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough to wear with leggings
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a nice weight. The fit is as expected except that it is not long enough to cover my bottom. I am 5' 8".
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tunic for leggings or jeans!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, flattering top for wearing with leggings, but could also be worn with jeans. It is not frumpy and dumpy like some tunics can look. The material is soft. If you're between sizes, I would go with the smaller size. I'm a somewhat busty 10/12 and ordered the Large and it fit great. The Extra Large was way too big. I'm 5'3", for reference. I recommend this top if you're looking for something that is attractive, comfortable and covers most or all of your front and back in leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kolesar

customer_reviews.title: stylish and warm,
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and fit of this tunic. It's very comfortable and I have worn it several times since I received it. I have ordered another one, different color. I was just a little disappointed in the type of fabric. It's certainly a good fabric weight, but it's a bit clingy. For winter and fall wear only as it's more like sweater material.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the fabric is soft and gentle against your skin, and it was a cotton/polyester blend, but it felt like it was 100% polyester to me, and was also very stiff and uncomfortable against my skin. It didn't feel as if it would breathe at all. Maybe it would have felt better after washing it, but then I couldn't return it, and I wasn't about to take that risk so I'll never know. The fabric was so stiff it didn't drape as nicely as it appears to in the product pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this shirt. The size chart is not accurate for me. I ordered both large and medium because I had tried another Tunic in which the large was a little big. I am returning this Tunic in the large size. I wear a US size 8, the medium was fine the large was huge! Not a problem since the return policy is so good. If the return policy was not free I would never have bought not knowing the sizes correctly. Once I wash it and wear it if it falls apart I will update my review to state that. Otherwise it appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten a Medium
customer_reviews.text: Love this top, I’m keeping it, even though it is a little big in the shoulder and armpit area. The size chart says That my size is L, but a M would look better (5’4”, 120 lbs). Beautiful neckline, super price, and fast shipping. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisazxc

customer_reviews.title: Thought I had chosen the closest and best fit size
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6. 130 lbs. XL too large. Spent a lot of time debating about the proper size. Tried to follow the US size conversion chart, measurements of bust, hip, arm; and read many reviews about the sizing. Thought I had chosen the closest and best fit size. But, Too large. Closer to a dress than a top, comes to about 6" above my knees. Sleeves are long (I have average to long arms. Could shorten the sleeves easy enough. As described, the fabric is wonderful, and the style is classy. Rather than send it back, think I will just use these for PJs. Looks great with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Lnntthmps

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but size didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice top. The color was a deep purple, which I liked. However, I ordered the medium (I usually wear small) and it still fit more snug than I like. If I ordered the large, the sleeves would have been too long. This product came on time and the return process was effortless. Only reason for four stars is the size didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top is more fitted well across the chest and ribcage area and then drapes nicely, hiding the stomach area without looking like a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely purchase this again. I'm about 5'8" and in the upper 160lb range. I ordered a large. The top is more fitted well across the chest and ribcage area and then drapes nicely, hiding the stomach area without looking like a tent. I wish the sleeves were a bit longer, as the sleeves don't quite get down to my wrists, but that is a typical problem I have with most long sleeve shirts. I am considering purchasing the same top again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: utopiachick

customer_reviews.title: Exceed the expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Exceed the expectation! Very soft and thick enough to be a sweater. this is new style for me and I would love to have this with skinny jeans and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Cbass

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric quality is okay but the fit was HORRIBLE. I ordered a 2X and although it was labeled a 2X it looked like a medium. Sent it back. I hate when companies miss-label their garments.
customer_reviews.author: Jo K.

customer_reviews.title: Product was switched out for a different brand and color.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not Miusey, a different brand was sent, it is not the correct color as indicated and it does not fit as indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna J. Spargo

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, Uneven quality
customer_reviews.text: Not enough room across the bust. The top was too tight across the bust, so I returned it. The next size up was too big in the shoulders and hips although it fit across the bust. Beware that the fabric is not the same from top to top. I bought the first one, loved the fabric but it pulled too much across the bust. Returned it, and was surprised that the fabric was so different! The second top was coarse, scratchier fabric. The first top was stretchy and cozy fabric. I ordered it in a different color, and that was completely different fabric... silky and stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric but a little baggy and somewhat short
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric but somewhat short and rather baggy on the body. Not the same green as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long............
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tunic, but it is very long if you are short. I am 5'2" and it falls down around my knees. So, in order for me to get it to fit through the hips, the length is too long. Because it has a border that matches the sleeves, I cannot shorten it. I plan to wear it with a pair of black leggings, and add small heels so it doesn't look like a dress. I like the shirt it would be nice to be shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and styling! Runs small, especially in the bust and shoulders, but is great
customer_reviews.author: C185ME

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I decided to order a size larger than normal and it fits beautifully. Instead of ordering a medium or large I got an XL and it fits just right. The fabric is very soft and appears to be high quality. I ordered the purple which is sort of a plum color and plan to wear it with with jeans. It's a bit too short to wear with leggings or tights. It's definitely a shirt and you couldn't get away with wearing it as a dress. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful top, doesn't shed much, doesn't itch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the length. I am 5'10" and pear shaped, and I am constantly searching for something that will flatter my curves. This is the perfect item to cover up my hips and thighs without looking baggy or frumpy. I have already received many compliments on it and plan to buy it in more colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.E.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Great pattern design! Good fit with extra flare at the hip. I have narrow hips so I had to have it taken in. Sewn together well . Great fit in the neckline shoulders and arms. I have long arms & the sleeves were long enough to fit me. A rare find. I would definitely buy it again and try the other styles from this manufacturer. Fabric design is printed not woven and feels a bit plastic to the touch. Naturally, it doesn't breath very well so it insulates the body heat. However, it's perfect for the chill of the winter months. Although the fabric is thin, it's too hot for warmer temps. I think you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: Flattering!
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Flattering shirt. Made to wear with skinny jeans or leggings. Long shirt-came to my mid-thigh. I had a hard time deciding on a size- I am 5’6” about 140 and typically wear a size 10. I ordered a large. The shirt is a bit loose (I’m not swimming in it) but I was afraid the medium would hug too much. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I like the neckline of this very much, and the quality is nice for the price. The bottom of the shirt is not as loosely cut as the photo shows. Although I like it, I may end up passing it on to my daughter who is a bit slimmer than I am.
customer_reviews.author: cjp

customer_reviews.title: Love this tunic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tunic! Goes great with leggings and covers well. I'm 5'3" 130lbs with a short torso so I'm not sure a taller person will have it cover hips and rear end if that is what you're going for. I ended up ordering the large worried it would be too big, but it fit perfectly for me (large bust). The fabric is incredibly soft, and the color is gorgeous though the "wine" is more red than burgundy. It's well made and very flattering. I should've ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: SarahD

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the print and the neckline of this top! Fits as I had hoped. Fabric is nice weight for cooler months, not flimsy, a bit of stretch. Sleeves are about 1" too long on but at 5'2", 140lbs very few garments have perfect length sleeves for me! I like to push sleeves up to just below elbow, so it works great for me. Hits me about mid thigh which is a fabulous fit in my opinion. Perfect with leggings
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fabric just a quote this to get that I purchased in 2017 I would not
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this top in the burgundy color the green color in the gray color in 2017. I recently purchased the green and blue I was shocked at how poor the quality of the fabric Is. It was extremely thin you can see my bra through it. The fabric was so stretchy it just fell off my shoulders and hung in a stretchy thin mass. It is nothing like the product I purchased almost 3 years ago I would not recommend this at all
customer_reviews.author: JJstarlight

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this top! Very flattering and perfect to wear with leggings or skinny jeans. Button detail is perfect and the fabric is really nice. I normally wear an XL but ordered the 2XL based off of other reviewers. I’m glad I got the larger size. The bottom is perfect but the chest would have been too tight on a smaller size, and I don’t have a huge chest. So, I suggest sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: First they sucked me in with this big sale going on
customer_reviews.text: First they sucked me in with this big sale going on. Then it was only for little people. I am not huge but borderline Plus. So I paid more and ordered my usual size but had to return it - there was a white spot on the front and it was way too small. When I went to order the next size up they wanted to charge me over $10.00 more!! Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this tunic online, but in reality the material is very thin, the color is much darker than expected (no argument there -- I'm a designer so I totally understand monitor calibration issues), and the neckline is more of a turtleneck than a cowl, too high for my comfort. I'd return it if the postage weren't roughly the same price as the tunic ... maybe someone else would like to have it. I can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Youngclaus

customer_reviews.title: Nice top!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice top and very soft material. I washed it, as I do everything I buy, and it washed very well. It is just a bit big in the shoulders. I normally wear between a size 8 and 10 and this top was a Large. I may have been able to get away with the smaller size but I'm happy with this being roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on a whim, new favorite top.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because of those Amazon algorithms that suggest things to you, and turns out, this is my new favorite top, so I thought it's only fair to share my satisfaction for the next person who happenstances into this awesome garment. It's one of those you-can-wear-it-to-work-but-also-on-the-weekend-and-it-feels-like-pajamas kind of top. It's the top that makes you buy the laundry detergent that doesn't fade fabric. (I say this like I haven't been using the same detergent for twenty years.) Anyway, get this top. It's a good top.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtnie

customer_reviews.title: Flattering , Comfortable Tunic
customer_reviews.text: This is my edited comment. The company, Miusey. Replaced my rust colored tunic top which is the same style as one pictured here. The rust is very pretty and the rust was replaced in a size larger size.....XL. I suggest when ordering this top , you order a size larger. I am very pleased with the larger size...very stylish, comfortable, and flattering. Perfect for Fall! The button collar adds a special touch. I will definitely order more!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's up with this fabric, but it doesn't feel good or fall well on the body. It's some sort of synthetic, creepy awfulness. I should have returned it, but I needed to stain my deck so I ended up using it to rub the stain into the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this knit tunic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knit tunic!! The collar accents are so nice and such a relief to have a design around the neck area instead of just a round neck opening that is usually too revealing. Hoping we will have a few more chilly days this season so I can wear it soon! I'm 5'3" and 160, pear-shaped. I ordered the XL based on the size chart and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flatters the figure
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7”, 138 lbs and ordered the large. It’s a good fit. I’m 76, so modesty and bust fit are important. I’m all covered up, but still have a few curves. This flatters me. I loved it so much, I ordered two more colors. In Louisiana, we don’t have Winter, so I’ll be able to wear them until Spring. The fabric is soft and substantial. I washed on gentle and hung to dry. Perfect result.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S Meyerer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Heavyweight Polyester
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice top! There is no cotton, it is 100% polyester. I believe that is just in the description because some of the 2-tone shirts are partially cotton. There is some stretch, the gentle A-line type flare is very flattering. I am 5’3, 135 lbs with a 38dd bust😡 and I got a size M. With my bust being so large it does create some wrinkles across the back...but looks great from the front. It hits at my lower hip and I could definitely wear this with leggings. I would say this top runs true to size. Be aware this is a heavy polyester, not breathable, and will be suitable in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up, as recommended in some reviews and found it just a tad roomier than I'd prefer. It's comfortable. The look of it is nice, the buttons and neckline are cute. The material has a decent weight to it, but I find that it doesn't hold its shape as well as I'd like. That paired with the roominess, makes it just ok. Perhaps if I tried another size, I'd like it more. Will update if I do.
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color is nothing like the photo, and the photo looks like the bottom flows out with pleats which is does not. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Miss B

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering for my figure
customer_reviews.text: Not flattering. I am a bit heavy and thought this would hide it but somehow it just seems to emphasize the bad bits. My 30 yr old daughter loved it until she tried it on. Same result.
customer_reviews.author: M Robinson

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS TRUE TO SIZE AND COMFORTABLE...NOT SCRATCHY!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE COLORS, GOING TO GO IN AND BUY THE SAME PATTERN IN BLACK.. LOVE THIS SHIRT. TRUE TO SIZE, NOT SEE THROUGH AND GREAT PRICE, IT WEARS WELL. I BOUGHT BIGGER SIZE 1ST OFF, *THINKING THIS WOULD BE ANOTHER TIME IT COMES TO SMALL SAYING IT XL,[I AM 200 LBS AND 5'5"/48 BUST]ANYWAY SENDING 1ST ONE BACK, AND ALREADY GOT A NEW ONE.. FOR CHRISTMAS DAY...LOVE IT..THANK YOU HAPPY HOILDAYS...
customer_reviews.author: jamalee witty

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite top
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this top based on previous customer reviews. I really really like this top. The fabric is a nice heavier weight interlock jersey (a.k.a. T-shirt fabric). I love that the length fully covers my hips and butt and makes my legs look great! This is an excellent style for curvy women with fuller hips. I wear it over H.U.E. leggings and have received many compliments. I will hand wash this top inside out and dry it Flat. I am 58 years old, 5'5", 142 pounds and bought a size Large
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size and prepare for compliments
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute sweater. I read other reviews recommending to go up a size, so I did and it skims my torso nicely and doesn't cling. I love the neckline and the fabric is very soft. It is warm enough for fall/winter weather, but it's a relatively lightweight sweater so it doesn't feel bulky under a winter coat. It's long enough to cover my butt when I just wear leggings. I have washed and dried this on Delicate a few times now and found zero pilling or shrinking. I checked out the other designs from this seller, but this is by far the cutest look. Love this cozy sweater!
customer_reviews.author: Modaum

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Tee
customer_reviews.text: I have to shop for my bust measurement that is 14" larger than my waist. I ordered the size that coordinated with my bust measurement and it makes the rest of the top a bit too large. I will wear it because I don't stand up being in a wheelchair the too large part is somewhat hidden and I don't really have to alter it. The fabric is very soft and will work perfectly so as not to exacerbate my pain condition that triggers skin sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Light Weight Top
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, light weight top. I'm 5'9 1/2, 130#, ordered a small. The green was lighter in color than I thought it would be, I was hoping for a darker emerald green. It's more of a green/gray. It is also a bit shorter than I was expecting. It doesn't quit fall below my behind, so I can't wear with leggings, but is fine w/ skinny jeans. Quality of fabric seems nice. I also ordered the black w/ the gray pattern, and I love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Nice style and fabric for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, cut, and design. Perfectly matched colors advertised. Fit body, neck, and length true to size ordered. Sleeve length was a couple inches too long but I am short. I can always cuff, roll, or hem them. It is nice fabric and appears to be stitched/sewn correctly. I have tried it on for fit but have not worn it or washed it yet to state how it wears or washes. It is really nice for the price. If it wears and washes well, I will plan to order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft top
customer_reviews.text: I loved this top. I bought my normal size - medium. It was restrictively tight. I weigh 123 lbs and am 5’1”. I have reordered up a size and we’ll see how that fits. This applies to all of this brands softer warmer tops in this style. I ordered four and three needed to be sized up. The other was a satiny top also ordered in a medium and that was HUGE on me. They don’t make a small so that one has fallen by the wayside. This top though is a great style and so soft and cozy for winter. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith19

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable ,non - see through and no wrinkle material.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shirt. It is very well made with non - see through durable material. It is so soft against my skin. Non - wrinkle too! Iike this shirt so much that I had to buy more!! The only thing that could be improved upon is the length. I am 5' 3 1/2" tall and I weigh 195#. This tunic almost reaches my knees. More of a dress length than a tunic length. I would prefer it if it was 2 to 3" shorter. You could actually wear this as a sweater dress. Still, I highly recommend this tunic!
customer_reviews.author: Pure Papillons

customer_reviews.title: Cowl neck Tunic, pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tunic, nice quality, soft comfortable material and fit. I wouldn't however call it form fitting as it states. However I like things loose fitting and ordered a large, so what size you order will determine your preferred fit. I usually wear a medium so in that case it may have been more form fitting. The size I ordered looked really nice and I received lot's of compliments on it. I ordered another in a different color and haven't worn it yet but did notice the material was not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M

customer_reviews.title: Nice top, but runs a little bit small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this top because I liked the design. I ordered 2XL, which is what I usually wear in tops. I wear 1XL or 2XL, but I decided to go a little larger for looser fit. Well, when it arrived i immediately knew it was gonna be small. I tried it on and it was tight especially around the waist. I am returning it and will order size 3XL. I am hoping 3XL will fit. Update 1/5/2019: Ordered 3XL. It fit me perfectly. The sleeves are little bit long, but overall it's the perfect fit. So if you are size 18-20 go with 3XL.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price, cute but fabric is thinner than I expected causing "ride up" in the butt.
customer_reviews.text: A bit boxy, not as much shape as shown in the pix. The fabric is lighter weight than I expected causing it to "ride up" in the back (butt) when walking. Nice looking, great color. The back seems to be a bit shorter than the front. I ordered a small, I am 5'4" and 108#.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Sizing little off but nice top
customer_reviews.text: Received my top that I ordered in gray. As I’ve not had good success of fit in clothing lately, even closely utilizing maker’s chart, I ordered this in xl. For reference I’m 5’6” 165 lbs with 38 D bust. I could have worn a size large but I plan to wash this on warm and dry in dryer. Hopefully that will do the trick. Otherwise, it’s just as pictured. Nice soft material, of medium weight and doesn’t cling to midsection but drapes nicely. For me, this covers rear and hem line touches top of my thighs. I’d consider ordering this item again.
customer_reviews.author: LBP

customer_reviews.title: Too tight - sleeves too long
customer_reviews.text: This is super adorable in the picture. I normally wear a 3x so that's what I ordered. It's skin tight on me and not flattering at all. It's soooo tight. If they made a 5x I would probably exchange it, but they don't. Also, the sleeves are so long I would have to hem them by 2". The designers must think that if you do a big shirt and stomach part that your arms grow longer too. I'm returning this. Too bad, because it's adorable. The fit is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible material
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. I didn't bother to send it back because I think if I wash and dry it first it might be just "OK". Its higher in the back than in the front, which defeats the purpose of covering my butt. I'm only 5'2", so it should be longer. Was hoping it was so I could wear leggings with it. No way! By the sounds of the reviews, the cut of this shirt is inconsistent, so if you buy it (which I don't recommend) you take your chances! And the material is cheap too, I know it's going to shrink up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: FABRIC IS CLINGY
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the look. The issue I have is with the fabric. It is way too clingy. The bottom skirt-like portion clings to my leggings like crazy! Every time I get up from my desk, I must pull it off my leggings all the way around. Very disappointed with this hassle because it looks great for office attire. If I had known how clingy the material is, I would not have ordered. I bought the black with black & red plaid. The material also acts as a lint & hair magnet in the clothes dryer. I have to spend considerable time cleaning it up with a lint roller every time it's laundered. Beware of the hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Connecta

customer_reviews.title: Flattering top
customer_reviews.text: The style of this top was very flattering and the fabric was very soft, not too thin or clingy. Unfortunately, the size medium was too big for me. I usually wear a size 10 and have a 36" bust, but the medium was about 2 inches too wide on the sides. Although the green color was nice and the trim was attractive, I really didn't like the way the wide bottom trim looked across my hips. I had to return the top. I might purchase it again in a smaller size and in a solid color.
customer_reviews.author: Customer JR

customer_reviews.title: The top fit as I had hoped but the color ...
customer_reviews.text: The top fit as I had hoped but the color was not nearly as vibrant as the picture showed. I would have returned it but had ordered it for an event so had to keep it. Following my review above, I was contacted directly by a Miusey representative. They were concerned that I wasn't 100 percent happy with my purchase and wanted to do whatever it took to change that. They were willing to refund me, replace the item or send a new item in order to make things right. I have had several email exchanges with the rep and the matter has been resolved. Their customer service is excellent and I will definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Williams

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size up... and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 195lbs. This is a heavy material, which I LOVE... perfect for winter. Sleeve length is great. ...On me a 32" length is exactly mid-thigh... and this is just that. So I feel comfortable in this and jeggings. ...Still just a tad short for tights-like leggings. I normally wear XXL and reviews said order size larger... and I'm elated that I did because it's PERFECT. Comfortable, get compliments all the time... just a very nice top. I think I'll order another color.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, and the thickest knit I’ve seen in a non-sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Clothing sold in the USA is legally required to have a fabric content label. There is none. This is a non-shiny, thick knit fabric that is pleasantly soft and draping after one wash on delicate cycle. As comfortable as any loungewear, but it can do the office or do dinner in the winter time easily. I particularly like wearing it with my black on white Zentangle leggings, with my realistic-looking holly and berry Christmas brooch.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: For form fit, order your size.
customer_reviews.text: This tunic is comfortable. I am 5'2 and 130 lbs and normally wear a small. I saw many reviews that said to order a size up. So, I ordered a medium. It is loose on me and long. Goes down to about 5" above my knee so it will work great with leggings. If you want a more form fit, order your size. I will be ordering another one of these, but a small. I will keep this one as it still looks cute, even if a little bigger than I need.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I loved the top's design and material
customer_reviews.text: I loved the top's design and material. It was very nice. However, it is rather fitted through the midsection and did not look good on me, so I returned it. If you're looking for a tunic that is a combination of loose at the bottom and somewhat more fitted across the bust and midsection, this is a good choice. If you're a plus size with bumps and bulges, you might want something a bit looser.
customer_reviews.author: Mausita

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, beautiful color and style, got a lot of compliments every time I've worn it. I'm 270 lbs and this fit perfectly. The sleeves aren't tight, and the shoulders are comfortable too. It's long enough to cover my tummy even when I lift my arms. All in all, it's a wonderful shirt.
customer_reviews.author: A. Soots

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TUNIC! It's comfortable, durable, and fits super cute. I've gotten so many compliments on it. I bought it a couple of sizes up because I wanted it bigger, but I could have just gone one size up and been better off. It seems like it would fit pretty true to size. Might order another one because I've lost weight and the oversized size I chose is getting more oversized than I like. I definitely highly recommend this tunic!!
customer_reviews.author: Natty D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Top - Already Buying Another
customer_reviews.text: I just received this top yesterday, have it on today, and am already back to buy it in a couple of other colors. It's a nice heavy weight, just above t-shirt and under sweat shirt in fabric weight, if that helps. But it fits perfect and I like it a lot. I like the collar - you can push it down a little or pull it up, just a really nice design. I got it in black and think I'd like blue or red.
customer_reviews.author: MsDayPlanner

customer_reviews.title: Not well put together.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is fine on this top but I was disappointed in this. It would have been just what I wanted but the design on the fabric at the bottom was not straight when it was attached. It makes the top look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Green 2 is spot on
customer_reviews.text: The green 2 is a dark almost heathered green, beautiful. This color is almost like a light sweater material, very soft and comfy. I ordered 3XXX (5' tall, 200 lbs, 38DD) , did I say I really HATE these asian sizes? I'm not thin but that is truly depressing, lol. Anyway, fits nicely through the body, even after the washer and dryer. Still, for me I will have to hem sleeves and bottom as the length is nearly to my knees
customer_reviews.author: Debora D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Runs large.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black L. The fabric is heavy and of very good quality, as is the construction. It's a thick, warm top suitable for fall or air conditioned offices. Surprisingly, this shirt runs large. Order one size down from what the size chart recommends. My measurements are 39/31/42 and the L fits exactly right in a comfy/loose kind of way. I had to return the too-large size at first and then process was pain free. I plan to order more. It's so rare to find this kind of fabric and construction quality these days.
customer_reviews.author: Maradon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I guessed on the size. I'm a typical 14 in shirts. I opted for XXL, and it was a perfect fit! I love it! I wish I had a full length fit.. but I don't. The fabric is not thin (see through), great stitching, the length comes down to mid thigh on me (I'm 5'1), and the sleeves come down to the knuckles on my hands. I love the vibrant color of this Royal Blue!!! I paired this with skinny jeans and black boots. No compliments from my kinder... but coworkers like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large after reading reviews. It came quickly, but was WAY TO LARGE. Although the pattern design is cute and color correct, the fabric is cheap, cheap, cheap. It was not even a top I would say, "Maybe yes, maybe know." I immediately said,"No way!" Into the packaging it went and back to store.
customer_reviews.author: typist

customer_reviews.title: Super thick and clingy
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I rarely give less than 5 stars for any product as long as it's at least a good quality product. This shirt is a nice material, but it was not the way it was described, as "flowy" tunic in. I ordered several other tops similar to this one, and they were all just right and as described. This shirt was off-color and too thick to be described as "flowy. It felt a lot more clingy than flowy because the material was so thick. Also, the neck is a lot higher than the other shirts. I will be returning this unless I can pawn it off to my mother.
customer_reviews.author: elvy

customer_reviews.title: But I’m keeping it because it looks great. For those with sizing issues
customer_reviews.text: I got this in Carbon Black as an XL and it was too big, but it was really soft. When I tried to get a L, it was not available in Carbon Black. So, I got wine. I just received it today. It fits perfectly; however, it’s not nearly as soft and luxurious feeling as the Carbon Black. But I’m keeping it because it looks great. For those with sizing issues, I wear a 38DD at Victoria’s Secret and it fits the bust area perfectly. I’m 5’5”-my legs and torso are “average” and it hits just a bit above mid-thigh. It’s fitted just enough to show the curves but not so much that I look like a sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Myself

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I like the tunic but they run very small. I normally wear a large occasionally an extra large, I ordered a double X and it is a little snug in the shoulders. The item is exactly as pictured, I love the detailing. Be aware that this runs very small.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving but comfortable top
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the green and the color isn’t anything like the picture. It’s actually gray with maybe a hint of green. I was looking forward to a top in a dark green so that is disappointing. Not a full as the bottom as pictured but very comfortable anyway. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I get complements every time I eat this shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something loose and flowy for my pregnancy. Glad I bought it. Post pregnancy I still wear it often and get complements on it every time. I am long waisted so I can't wear this with just leggings. It is long short length rather than tunic or short dress length, but that is what I expected. Thick, soft material. Washes nicely and was great for this last winter. Looking to add a couple more colors this next year.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you're wearing a bell.
customer_reviews.text: The first issue I have is that the bottom is way too wide and not tapered. It looks like a bell and makes your hips look very big. Secondly, it's very narrow at the shoulders. And, lastly, the material is yucky (I can't think of a better word to explain it). It's not soft and very constricting. Too bad because I really like the pattern options that it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Great top!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect for me! I ordered per the size chart. Good color for this time of year (fall to winter). I can easily wear this to work and I can easily dress this up. **if you wash this in warm or hot water the sleeves will shrink up on you - length wise.**
customer_reviews.author: Keepin' it real!

customer_reviews.title: Way too big on me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 / 140lbs, small hips/broad chest and shoulders. I usually wear a large or extra large to get sleeve length and overall length. Some of the other reviews showed photos that barely seemed to cover the rear. So I went with an XL. It was way too big. I dont mind a drapey or flowy kind of big, but this hung like a maternity shirt and made me look enormous. And it was actually too long! I think I'll try ordering a Medium!
customer_reviews.author: N. Buscher

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews indicated, order a size larger. I ordered the XXL, I'm 5'8" and 185lbs. This fits great, the fabric is warm and think, it looks great and feels good too. This was the right size for me even though I would normally order a L or XL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is ridiculous. Chart indicated I need a ...
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is ridiculous. Chart indicated I need a large but it was way too big. Returned. I ordered the rust color in medium and it fits fine, and the fabric is a good soft but substantial quality for cold weather wear. I am upgrading from 2 stars to 4.
customer_reviews.author: An Asheville Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Order up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great top. I love the style, weight of fabric and neckline. After reading a lot of the reviews I chose the medium size. Although it fits, I' m afraid after washing that might change. I' m 5"3 135lbs but I have a shape. I found this top to be a little less flowy than I wanted and the medium didn't give the rear coverage I was hoping for. I'm returning the medium and have ordered the large.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Virgo

customer_reviews.title: Greek fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 4" tall and 195 lbs, I ordered the extra large and hit fit true to size. Love the weight of the material and the colored saturation. It drapes nicely on the body and it's more of a dressy casual, great for the office
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love this top. You can wear it as casual dressy and it looks and fits great. It is a heavier material so it is warm on really cold days. I loved it so much, I ordered another color. It is loose fitting at the bottom, so it will fit a lot of body types. I am 5’5” and a rather straight body type. I ordered a small and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Gram-ma-ma

customer_reviews.title: Tailored snug fit, well made.
customer_reviews.text: This item is really pretty but fit is tailored. It fits snugly but is very comfortable. I thought it would have flow to it, NOT FLOWING until it hits the hip area. I am not returning it because of the quality. The colors are true, the red is a red not maroon. The material is thick and it’s warmer than most I’ve seen like this. I recommend but if your on the heavier bubbly side you may want to order up a size or wear a wrap.
customer_reviews.author: nant

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this top in the photo, not so much in person. It was a little tight through the chest (I'm not big busted) and it did not hang like it does in the photo. More like a triangle, wide at the bottom and narrow at the top. The fabric has a weird feel to it similar to felt. I threw out all the tags etc so I don't know if it's returnable. Really disappointed as I loved the look of it as advertised and I needed tunics to wear with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Hauoli Wahine
